metadata.job_location: Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile

seniority_level.evidence: 5+ years experience requirement combined with mentoring junior engineers and reviewing implementations suggests senior level responsibilities

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines, integration, and modeling

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions data pipelines and GCP but no specific focus on streaming, batch, or specialized areas like ML ops or governance

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions providing guidance and mentorship to junior data engineers and reviewing their implementations, indicating technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Google Cloud Platform mentioned explicitly multiple times as preferred technology and staying current with latest GCP trends

secondary_clouds.evidence: Only GCP mentioned, with basic knowledge of other cloud environments but no specific secondary cloud providers named

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on data pipelines and scheduled data collection from multiple sources suggests batch processing paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: No specific orchestration tools mentioned, only CI/CD integration with Git

storage_layer.evidence: No specific data warehouse, lake, or lakehouse technologies mentioned despite data engineering focus

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location requirement in Las Condes, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile with onsite work model

timezone_focus.evidence: Regional team spanning Chile and US suggests Americas timezone focus with potential cross-timezone collaboration

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model with specific location requirement implies relocation to Santiago, Chile area

h1b_friendly.evidence: Position based in Chile makes H1B visa irrelevant; no visa sponsorship mentioned for international candidates

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Chile-based position with no mention of student visa support; focus on local work authorization

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship restrictions mentioned, implying work authorization in Chile is the main requirement

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time employment type with benefits structure suggests W2 employee arrangement typical in Chile

benefits_level.evidence: No specific benefits mentioned in job posting despite comprehensive requirements section

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions staying current with latest trends and proposing solutions but no specific career advancement paths mentioned

mentorship_signals.evidence: Explicitly mentions providing orientation and mentorship to junior data engineers as core responsibility

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career growth within the role description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Technical leadership expectations suggest IC track advancement, but no management track mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Multiple 'must have' requirements including 5+ years experience, advanced programming skills, cloud certification preference, and specific technical competencies

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities around data pipelines, quality, and GCP technologies

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements appear reasonable for senior data engineer level with 5+ years experience, including appropriate technical skills mix
